Introduction
============

1. What is OC Lettings ?
-------------------------

Orange County Lettings is a start-up in the property rental sector. The start-up is currently expanding in the United States. 
The purpose of this site is to enable users to rent out their property or find a property to rent.


2. Main features
----------------

This site is still under development
The current features allow you to view properties for rent and consult the profiles of registered users.

3. Technologies used
--------------------

- Python 3.12
- Django 3.0
- Pytest 8.3
- Sentry 2.14
- Sphinx 8.0


4. Target audience
------------------

As this site is part of an OpenClassRooms training project, it is presented for information purposes only.
